In the spirit of the modern skyline of its namesake, the Chicago Petite 40 has a neoclassical style and design. Built with a Sitka Spruce soundboard and Hard Maple body, the Chicago Petite 40 has a clear and dependable sound. The soundboard is decorated with a beautiful climbing vine and the mechanism features solid brass action plates.
